name: Super Little Acorns 3D Turbo
description: Lead Mr. Nibbles on a 3D mission to recover his acorn stash when pesky critters steal them. He must use his trusty grapple rope to navigate the treacherous woodland environments and defeat those critters! • 90 levels of pixel perfect platforming in beautiful crisp graphics • 50% new exclusive levels, new bonuses, turbo mode and a whole bunch of zany outfits • Smash and swing through 30 exclusive challenges to test your skill at bronze, silver and gold level • 60 main stages spread over four seasons with epic bosses • Collect power-ups to supercharge your adventure
